localised_text.last_approved_text: This fool dares challenge me?! He thinks I care about his trivial lust for power?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: This fool dares challenge me?! He thinks I care about his trivial lust for power?

localised_text.last_approved_text: I will teach him a bitter lesson - one for all who defy me, who dare to oppose the will of the Chaos Gods!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I will teach him a bitter lesson - one for all who defy me, who dare to oppose the will of the Chaos Gods!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Here is a maggot to make an example of! It will be a warning to all the Chieftains of the North.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Here is a maggot to make an example of! It will be a warning to all the Chieftains of the North.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now, my followers, let us attend this tiresomeness - by dusk I wish to be swilling the maggot’s blood in his upturned skull, while channelling his ravaged spirit into Morkar’s armour!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now, my followers, let us attend this tiresomeness - by dusk I wish to be swilling the maggot’s blood in his upturned skull, while channelling his ravaged spirit into Morkar’s armour!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Even as this Daemon-spawn plots to overthrow me, I know my destiny is absolute. Bel’lakor will coronate me!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Even as this Daemon-spawn plots to overthrow me, I know my destiny is absolute. Bel’lakor will coronate me!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Come them, Changer, bring your best! I will prove once more that I am the Everchosen…

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Come them, Changer, bring your best! I will prove once more that I am the Everchosen…

localised_text.last_approved_text: For I am the Anointed, the Bringer of Woes - the one, true, LORD OF CHAOS!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: For I am the Anointed, the Bringer of Woes - the one, true, LORD OF CHAOS!

localised_text.last_approved_text: At last! A worthy challenger comes!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: At last! A worthy challenger comes!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Not some weak minion sent by the Gods. No, what confronts me is something more corrupt, more bestial. It serves no master, seeks no glory other than its own! And that I applaud… even as I rip at its throats. For it must die. No man, no God… no creature, can challenge me and live!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Not some weak minion sent by the Gods. No, what confronts me is something more corrupt, more bestial. It serves no master, seeks no glory other than its own! And that I applaud… even as I rip at its throats. For it must die. No man, no God… no creature, can challenge me and live!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Another thinks to bring me to my knees! Another who wishes me to bow before him, like he is some pitiless King!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Another thinks to bring me to my knees! Another who wishes me to bow before him, like he is some pitiless King!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Does he think his pathetic sorceries will work on me or my followers?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Does he think his pathetic sorceries will work on me or my followers?

localised_text.last_approved_text: Come, my Swords of Chaos, let us show this weakling conjurer who-would-be-royalty what I do to monarchs! He will see why I am the Lord of the End Times, why I am Everchosen, and why I will wield the Slayer of Kings!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Come, my Swords of Chaos, let us show this weakling conjurer who-would-be-royalty what I do to monarchs! He will see why I am the Lord of the End Times, why I am Everchosen, and why I will wield the Slayer of Kings!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The green things and Unliving alike will bear witness to my wrath! They are mine to dismember, to disembowel, to crush!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The green things and Unliving alike will bear witness to my wrath! They are mine to dismember, to disembowel, to crush!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I will smash all that remains of these ruins to powder and not stop until my hammer is found.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I will smash all that remains of these ruins to powder and not stop until my hammer is found.

localised_text.last_approved_text: And then the whole world will burn before I rest again - such is my rage - this is the new pact I make to the Dark Powers! Raaaaargh!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: And then the whole world will burn before I rest again - such is my rage - this is the new pact I make to the Dark Powers! Raaaaargh!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Ah, my loyal minions. Over the way stands something I want… I need. Beatific mail, wasted on the clueless worm who wears it.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Ah, my loyal minions. Over the way stands something I want… I need. Beatific mail, wasted on the clueless worm who wears it.

localised_text.last_approved_text: It is only right I take it from him, and if you, my serfs, die in agony during the attempt, then know that I'll feel your pain… why, I will relish it!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: It is only right I take it from him, and if you, my serfs, die in agony during the attempt, then know that I'll feel your pain… why, I will relish it!

localised_text.last_approved_text: To the ‘champion’ in my armour… Yes, you may have heard of me. I am Sigvald the Magnificent, the Geld-Prince of Slaanesh. I do not blame you if hearing my name has caused you to void your bowels. Just make sure the Auric Armour is clean when I come to take it.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: To the ‘champion’ in my armour… Yes, you may have heard of me. I am Sigvald the Magnificent, the Geld-Prince of Slaanesh. I do not blame you if hearing my name has caused you to void your bowels. Just make sure the Auric Armour is clean when I come to take it.

localised_text.last_approved_text: You could hand it straight over, of course, but I have seen your kind before. You will be irksome and make me fight for it.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: You could hand it straight over, of course, but I have seen your kind before. You will be irksome and make me fight for it.

localised_text.last_approved_text: No Matter! I could do with a workout - but do not over-vex me or your death-cry will be especially shrill and I do hate to taint my ears with such cacophonic nonsense if I can bear it.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: No Matter! I could do with a workout - but do not over-vex me or your death-cry will be especially shrill and I do hate to taint my ears with such cacophonic nonsense if I can bear it.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Sickly, sinful, spectacles stand, shuffle, shamble and saunter shamelessly in mine scandalized sight! I suggest a solution...

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Sickly, sinful, spectacles stand, shuffle, shamble and saunter shamelessly in mine scandalized sight! I suggest a solution...

localised_text.last_approved_text: Surely such sedition should sour and succumb to Sigvald - the salacious, scandalous and sensational servant of Slaanesh! Son of Succubi, scion of sordid acts and slayer of squalid serfs!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Surely such sedition should sour and succumb to Sigvald - the salacious, scandalous and sensational servant of Slaanesh! Son of Succubi, scion of sordid acts and slayer of squalid serfs!

localised_text.last_approved_text: See how I stroll, stride, swagger and swirl, spin, slash and stab at stupid, senseless scum! Soon they shall swoon, shall seek solace and death from sundry torments wrought on them by my strategic, severing, scintillating shower of shimmering strikes!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: See how I stroll, stride, swagger and swirl, spin, slash and stab at stupid, senseless scum! Soon they shall swoon, shall seek solace and death from sundry torments wrought on them by my strategic, severing, scintillating shower of shimmering strikes!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Send for the sword - summon Sliverslash!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Send for the sword - summon Sliverslash!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Puny Elf! Uncloven. Unknowing. Ignorant.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Puny Elf! Uncloven. Unknowing. Ignorant.

localised_text.last_approved_text: They take from me what is mine - weapon. Power!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: They take from me what is mine - weapon. Power!

localised_text.last_approved_text: They will regret. Morghur will change them; ruin them.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: They will regret. Morghur will change them; ruin them.

localised_text.last_approved_text: They will know our power, MY power! Raaarrr!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: They will know our power, MY power! Raaarrr!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Graktar is lame… grrr… his time is over! Put him in ground, let him feed worms! Now is the time of Khazrak! They call me cunning, they call me the One-Eye - I call me Beastlord of all! RRRRRRAAAAARRRR!!!!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Graktar is lame… grrr… his time is over! Put him in ground, let him feed worms! Now is the time of Khazrak! They call me cunning, they call me the One-Eye - I call me Beastlord of all! RRRRRRAAAAARRRR!!!!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Take them now!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Take them now!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Bathe in their blood – feast on their guts – gnaw on their bones!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Bathe in their blood – feast on their guts – gnaw on their bones!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let their puny wolf god know that it is the One-Eye who slaughters his pack!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Let their puny wolf god know that it is the One-Eye who slaughters his pack!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Graktar is lame. His time is over!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Put him in ground, let him feed worms! Now is the time of Khazrak!

localised_text.last_approved_text: They call me cunning, they call me the One-Eye - I call me Beastlord of all!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: They call me cunning, they call me the One-Eye - I call me Beastlord of all!

localised_text.last_approved_text: RRRRRRAAAARRRRR! Take them now! Bathe in their blood – feast on their guts – gnaw on their bones! Let their puny wolf god know that it is the One-Eye who slaughters his pack! RRRRRRAAAAARRRR!!!!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: RRRRRRAAAARRRRR! Take them now! Bathe in their blood – feast on their guts – gnaw on their bones! Let their puny wolf god know that it is the One-Eye who slaughters his pack! RRRRRRAAAAARRRR!!!!

localised_text.last_approved_text: See craven men! See them limp together like scared cattle… grr… They run no more; now is slaughter! Now we end lake hag's mongrels; now we end Sigmar's weak sons... grr... Kill for me, kill for dark masters, kill! That is why we were born! KILL!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: See craven men! See them limp together like scared cattle… grr… They run no more; now is slaughter! Now we end lake hag's mongrels; now we end Sigmar's weak sons... grr... Kill for me, kill for dark masters, kill! That is why we were born! KILL!

localised_text.last_approved_text: You are fools to spurn me, grrrr… Are we not all Children of Chaos? Man-filth are the true enemy. Grrr… if you not follow the Crowfather, then the Crowfather will crush you too!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: You are fools to spurn me, grrrr… Are we not all Children of Chaos? Man-filth are the true enemy. Grrr… if you not follow the Crowfather, then the Crowfather will crush you too!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I have seen it, my herd-kin! The Dark Masters, show me the way… grrrr… tear down their walls, burn their churches… grrrr… defile this river with man-filth bodies! Grrr… please me - your Crowfather - and let the Dark Omen spread… GRRRRRR!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The Dark Masters, show me the way. Tear down their walls, burn their churches…

localised_text.last_approved_text: They run no more; now is slaughter! Now we end lake hag's mongrels; now we end Sigmar's weak sons.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: They run no more; now is slaughter! Now we end lake hag's mongrels; now we end Sigmar's weak sons.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Kill for me, kill for dark masters, kill! That is why we were born! KILL!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Kill for me, kill for dark masters, kill! That is why we were born! KILL!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Sons of Sigmar, to me! Out there in that fen is a heretic, holding the Jade Griffon to his chest like the grubby thief he is!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Sons of Sigmar, to me! Out there in that fen is a heretic, holding the Jade Griffon to his chest like the grubby thief he is!

localised_text.last_approved_text: To think that the talisman - a symbol of our Cult blessed by Magnus himself - is now in the clutches of this Necromancer and his Vampire consorts!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: To think that the talisman - a symbol of our Cult blessed by Magnus himself - is now in the clutches of this Necromancer and his Vampire consorts!

localised_text.last_approved_text: No! I say again, NO! Hunt down this filth, purge this place, and strike down any who dare to rise again - by the comet, that is my decree!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: No! I say again, NO! Hunt down this filth, purge this place, and strike down any who dare to rise again - by the comet, that is my decree!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Cult of Ulric has defamed us! The Midden-Wolves should be our allies, for was Sigmar not a worshipper of Ulric during his mortal span?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The Cult of Ulric has defamed us! The Midden-Wolves should be our allies, for was Sigmar not a worshipper of Ulric during his mortal span?

localised_text.last_approved_text: Instead they work against us, weakening the Empire that our sovereign lord, Emperor Karl Franz, has laboured so hard to unite under the Twin-Tailed Comet's glowing aspect.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Instead they work against us, weakening the Empire that our sovereign lord, Emperor Karl Franz, has laboured so hard to unite under the Twin-Tailed Comet's glowing aspect.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I will have no more of this foolishness! Slay this representative of the Ar-Ulric, let that be chastisement enough, and then - if Sigmar permits - we may become brothers-in-arms once more.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I will have no more of this foolishness! Slay this representative of the Ar-Ulric, let that be chastisement enough, and then - if Sigmar permits - we may become brothers-in-arms once more.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now we must fight this sorry battle, not for my honour but for that of Sigmar himself! To war!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now we must fight this sorry battle, not for my honour but for that of Sigmar himself! To war!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Not long, my brothers. Soon I shall have the missing pages and with the Liber Noctus complete I can begin your true resurrection!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Not long, my brothers. Soon I shall have the missing pages and with the Liber Noctus complete I can begin your true resurrection!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Mannfred may have set this task as a test, but I fear no challenge.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Mannfred may have set this task as a test, but I fear no challenge.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now, go my minions - onwards! Take these living fools by surprise. I'll have that casket and the pages within!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now, go my minions - onwards! Take these living fools by surprise. I'll have that casket and the pages within!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I have not seen such a pathetic sight since mine father-in-law, Otto, took his last breath! Is this all that thine Empire can muster?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I have not seen such a pathetic sight since mine father-in-law, Otto, took his last breath! Is this all that thine Empire can muster?

localised_text.last_approved_text: What a pitiful age this is! It makes me pander for the era of worthy foes, such as Wilhelm, or that Wolf Knight, Kruger... not this pathetic squabble of mortal men.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: What a pitiful age this is! It makes me pander for the era of worthy foes, such as Wilhelm, or that Wolf Knight, Kruger... not this pathetic squabble of mortal men.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yet, my sword thirsts and so it shall be slaked in the blood of living fools that think to challenge the might of von Carstein. Let the slaughter begin!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Yet, my sword thirsts and so it shall be slaked in the blood of living fools that think to challenge the might of von Carstein. Let the slaughter begin!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Mine puppets, do me this deed. Purge the area of insects so thy master can collect this warpstone unchallenged.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Mine puppets, do me this deed. Purge the area of insects so thy master can collect this warpstone unchallenged.

localised_text.last_approved_text: If mine memory serves, I sought out such material in Mordheim some centuries ago.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: If mine memory serves, I sought out such material in Mordheim some centuries ago.

localised_text.last_approved_text: They were halcyon days - when my minions hunted wyrdstone and the Empire was in ruins, as it will be again...

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: They were halcyon days - when my minions hunted wyrdstone and the Empire was in ruins, as it will be again...

localised_text.last_approved_text: Fetch me the head of this Strigoi - I would have this nuisance quashed!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Fetch me the head of this Strigoi - I would have this nuisance quashed!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I am risen to protect the Deepwood. Undead have no place on this earth, no place in my forest.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I am risen to protect the Deepwood. Undead have no place on this earth, no place in my forest.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Those who defile the land will face my fury. There will be no reprieve;

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Those who defile the land will face my fury. There will be no reprieve;

localised_text.last_approved_text: I am ancient. Eternal. Vengeful. I am Durthu!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I am ancient. Eternal. Vengeful. I am Durthu!

localised_text.last_approved_text: All has happened before. All will happen again. Suffering is unending - battle, eternal.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: All has happened before. All will happen again. Suffering is unending - battle, eternal.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The only answer is in kind; I will rise and smite the Undead outsiders.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The only answer is in kind; I will rise and smite the Undead outsiders.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Return to me the battle-gift of Daith that I might enact wrath upon the world!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Return to me the battle-gift of Daith that I might enact wrath upon the world!

localised_text.last_approved_text: This naïve and foolish Glade Lord has allowed his mind to be poisoned by the Prince of Pleasure.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: This naïve and foolish Glade Lord has allowed his mind to be poisoned by the Prince of Pleasure.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Dreaming Woods are a forbidden place of great malice and deception, and in his folly our erstwhile brother has been twisted by the dark deeds within.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The Dreaming Woods are a forbidden place of great malice and deception, and in his folly our erstwhile brother has been twisted by the dark deeds within.

localised_text.last_approved_text: There can be no further mercy. As I am born from Kurnous' spirit, so shall these dark servants be purged by it.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: There can be no further mercy. As I am born from Kurnous' spirit, so shall these dark servants be purged by it.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let them face the rage of the forest!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Let them face the rage of the forest!

localised_text.last_approved_text: These beasts call themselves 'hunters'? Hah! Do they not know they face Orion, Master of the Wild Hunt?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: These beasts call themselves 'hunters'? Hah! Do they not know they face Orion, Master of the Wild Hunt?

localised_text.last_approved_text: Their auras cannot protect them now, for I am charged with the spirit of Kurnous; rage and destruction flow through me!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Their auras cannot protect them now, for I am charged with the spirit of Kurnous; rage and destruction flow through me!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Fall upon them as the howling winds fall upon the winter leaves - show them that nothing can stand before the fury of the storm!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Fall upon them as the howling winds fall upon the winter leaves - show them that nothing can stand before the fury of the storm!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The seasons move ever on, and I feel the call to the Oak of Ages. Before I return to Ariel's embrace, another must be chosen to be born anew.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The seasons move ever on, and I feel the call to the Oak of Ages. Before I return to Ariel's embrace, another must be chosen to be born anew.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yet these traitors would sully the forest and bear a corrupt vision into being through their blackened hearts. These curs cannot be suffered to live.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Yet these traitors would sully the forest and bear a corrupt vision into being through their blackened hearts. These curs cannot be suffered to live.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Though we challenge Anath Raema herself, the will of Kurnous must spurn her once more, and overcome these perverse desires!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Though we challenge Anath Raema herself, the will of Kurnous must spurn her once more, and overcome these perverse desires!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The lost vault of Angrund is within reach!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The lost vault of Angrund is within reach!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Are we going to let these urk trespassers get away with their sneaky shenanigans? Do we let them steal the treasure and valuables which belong to the Angrund Clan by right?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Are we going to let these urk trespassers get away with their sneaky shenanigans? Do we let them steal the treasure and valuables which belong to the Angrund Clan by right?

localised_text.last_approved_text: No! We do not! Let the grudge be settled - let vengeance begin! Yaaaarh!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: No! We do not! Let the grudge be settled - let vengeance begin! Yaaaarh!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yes, my kin, today is a great day! Today we kill urks! Today is vengeance!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Yes, my kin, today is a great day! Today we kill urks! Today is vengeance!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Even now a throng from Karak Azul approaches the green-filth from the rear.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Even now a throng from Karak Azul approaches the green-filth from the rear.

localised_text.last_approved_text: We are honoured to dreng the Orcs from the front - let them face our might, let them see what Dawi of the Angrund Clan are made of!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We are honoured to dreng the Orcs from the front - let them face our might, let them see what Dawi of the Angrund Clan are made of!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Patience, Gobbla, soon you'll eat, and itz yer favourite - stunty-meat!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Patience, Gobbla, soon you'll eat, and itz yer favourite - stunty-meat!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Oi, you lot, I sed stay 'idden - we want to surpise the bearded gits, make 'em soil deir breeches when we jump out an' shout "Gotcha!"

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Oi, you lot, I sed stay 'idden - we want to surpise the bearded gits, make 'em soil deir breeches when we jump out an' shout "Gotcha!"

localised_text.last_approved_text: Well 'ere dey come now, and dey are all tool'd up ready to fight. Get ready boyz!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Well 'ere dey come now, and dey are all tool'd up ready to fight. Get ready boyz!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I 'ope yer 'ungry, Gobbla!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I 'ope yer 'ungry, Gobbla!

localised_text.last_approved_text: So predickable, dese stunties act like clockworkz. I bet I could work out when Ironhammer or Grudgebearer comb deir beardz if I wanted...

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So predickable, dese stunties act like clockworkz. I bet I could work out when Ironhammer or Grudgebearer comb deir beardz if I wanted...

localised_text.last_approved_text: So, 'ere's da plan, take 'em in da front and in da sidez. I want da way clear'd so I can get my new prodder! Geddit?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So, 'ere's da plan, take 'em in da front and in da sidez. I want da way clear'd so I can get my new prodder! Geddit?

localised_text.last_approved_text: If I see any of yoo runnin' da wrong way... well Gobbla 'ere iz' 'ungry - ee's alwayz 'ungry!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: If I see any of yoo runnin' da wrong way... well Gobbla 'ere iz' 'ungry - ee's alwayz 'ungry!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Dis false prophet don't talk to da Green Godz. I should know cos dey told me, dey don't like 'im! Ee smellz right funny. 'Ee got some crazy funk about 'im alright.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Dis false prophet don't talk to da Green Godz. I should know cos dey told me, dey don't like 'im! Ee smellz right funny. 'Ee got some crazy funk about 'im alright.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Go and kill da git and all 'iz mates. And get my mask back off 'im...

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Go and kill da git and all 'iz mates. And get my mask back off 'im...

localised_text.last_approved_text: ...dey nicked it and I want it back!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: ...dey nicked it and I want it back!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Black Fire Pass - it's all burnt, just 'ow I like my battlefieldz.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Black Fire Pass - it's all burnt, just 'ow I like my battlefieldz.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Gork want uz to fight da humies 'ere. Sez if we do dat and smack 'em about real good, den 'ee'll power up ma staff.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Gork want uz to fight da humies 'ere. Sez if we do dat and smack 'em about real good, den 'ee'll power up ma staff.

localised_text.last_approved_text: So listen to ya mate, Wurrzag - I'm da prophet and wot I sez goes! Let'z get 'em!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So listen to ya mate, Wurrzag - I'm da prophet and wot I sez goes! Let'z get 'em!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Um chuuka arrr, um chuuka arr, um chuuka ar Wurrzag Ud Ura Zahubu!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Um chuuka arrr, um chuuka arr, um chuuka ar Wurrzag Ud Ura Zahubu!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Right, dats Gork and Mork up-ta-date! And they're as miffed as me at dose gits stealin' my Squiggly Beast!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Right, dats Gork and Mork up-ta-date! And they're as miffed as me at dose gits stealin' my Squiggly Beast!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We gotta go and teach 'em a lesson; teach 'em not ta mess wiv Da Great Green Prophet! WAAAGH!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We gotta go and teach 'em a lesson; teach 'em not ta mess wiv Da Great Green Prophet! WAAAGH!

localised_text.last_approved_text: My friends; we are blighted by savage deception from those we once thought of as brothers! They have stolen the artefacts from beneath us and now they mock our righteous fury!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: My friends; we are blighted by savage deception from those we once thought of as brothers! They have stolen the artefacts from beneath us and now they mock our righteous fury!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We will not yield to these curs, no! We will plunge our blades into their ignoble hearts and reclaim our birthright!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We will not yield to these curs, no! We will plunge our blades into their ignoble hearts and reclaim our birthright!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Much like the sea crashing against the shore, we will crush these traitors. Now, with me, Companions; for Bordeleaux!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Much like the sea crashing against the shore, we will crush these traitors. Now, with me, Companions; for Bordeleaux!

localised_text.last_approved_text: It is a great deed we must do today. The twisted things of Chaos have come to our shores in vast numbers. Many were dashed upon the rocks, yet enough remain to pose a terrible threat.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: It is a great deed we must do today. The twisted things of Chaos have come to our shores in vast numbers. Many were dashed upon the rocks, yet enough remain to pose a terrible threat.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Malice seeps from their every pore and breath - they are the very essence of doom.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Malice seeps from their every pore and breath - they are the very essence of doom.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Should they win this day, Bretonnia will be nought but ruins. But hope endures; take solace in the Lady’s shining grace - for victory!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Should they win this day, Bretonnia will be nought but ruins. But hope endures; take solace in the Lady’s shining grace - for victory!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Companions - Bretonnia's need is dire! This terrible fog corrodes our focus. Our enemy, a horde of horrifying beasts, thrives in this gloom, so be on your guard.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Companions - Bretonnia's need is dire! This terrible fog corrodes our focus. Our enemy, a horde of horrifying beasts, thrives in this gloom, so be on your guard.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A head-on charge may not succeed - we must proceed more carefully. They are fast and deceptively cunning, but you are the Lady’s men, and no beast will stop you.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: A head-on charge may not succeed - we must proceed more carefully. They are fast and deceptively cunning, but you are the Lady’s men, and no beast will stop you.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Should we fail today, Bretonnia will be left vulnerable. The Kingdom relies on us; so fight to defend all you hold dear!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Should we fail today, Bretonnia will be left vulnerable. The Kingdom relies on us; so fight to defend all you hold dear!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Right, yoo gitz! Fink you can hide from me in dere! Dis fortress iz now mine!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Right, yoo gitz! Fink you can hide from me in dere! Dis fortress iz now mine!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I'm 'da Greatest' not som stinking goblin-lovin' git called Rotgut! Immortulz ta me - let'z get ‘em!!!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I'm 'da Greatest' not som stinking goblin-lovin' git called Rotgut! Immortulz ta me - let'z get ‘em!!!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Men of Reikland! Greenskins assault our capital. Theirs is a vile race Sigmar swore to expel from our lands, yet they dare return!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Men of Reikland! Greenskins assault our capital. Theirs is a vile race Sigmar swore to expel from our lands, yet they dare return!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Join me, men - for I will not rest until every accursed Goblin lies burning on a pyre!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Join me, men - for I will not rest until every accursed Goblin lies burning on a pyre!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Feeble Liche - come hence from mine fortress and kneel before thy Lord!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Feeble Liche - come hence from mine fortress and kneel before thy Lord!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Drakenhof's stones are bound by mortar of mine own blood. While yours shall be sprayed across the battlefield as I wrench the head from thine shoulders!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Drakenhof's stones are bound by mortar of mine own blood. While yours shall be sprayed across the battlefield as I wrench the head from thine shoulders!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Fellow Dawi, I see Orc scum! They foul our mountains with their vile taint.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Fellow Dawi, I see Orc scum! They foul our mountains with their vile taint.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Dammaz Kron, our Great Book of Grudges, is filled with such Greenskin atrocities! Bring hammer and axe - show these Urks and Grobi no mercy!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The Dammaz Kron, our Great Book of Grudges, is filled with such Greenskin atrocities! Bring hammer and axe - show these Urks and Grobi no mercy!

localised_text.last_approved_text: It is time for a cull, my kin, the creatures of Troll Country are nowt but a nuisance - a menace to be laid low!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: It is time for a cull, my kin, the creatures of Troll Country are nowt but a nuisance - a menace to be laid low!

localised_text.last_approved_text: To the Slayers, I say, chant your battle-hymns of doom, fulfil your oaths and seek glory in death!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: To the Slayers, I say, chant your battle-hymns of doom, fulfil your oaths and seek glory in death!

localised_text.last_approved_text: To the rest of the throng: I have studied the pages of the Dammaz Kron and found many, many entries of Trolls, Giants and other fell things attacking Dwarfen families, stealing our treasures, and destroying our holds!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: To the rest of the throng: I have studied the pages of the Dammaz Kron and found many, many entries of Trolls, Giants and other fell things attacking Dwarfen families, stealing our treasures, and destroying our holds!

localised_text.last_approved_text: These creatures are descendants of those perpetrators and the debt stands with them.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: These creatures are descendants of those perpetrators and the debt stands with them.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Destroy these monsters, bring them down like rotten elgi trees, so we may raid their filthy lairs and reclaim lost heirlooms that belong in Karaz-a-Karak!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Destroy these monsters, bring them down like rotten elgi trees, so we may raid their filthy lairs and reclaim lost heirlooms that belong in Karaz-a-Karak!

localised_text.last_approved_text: This is my edict as High King! Khazukan Kazakit-ha!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: This is my edict as High King! Khazukan Kazakit-ha!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Behold, the stone-fruits of the Engineers' Guild's labour!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Behold, the stone-fruits of the Engineers' Guild's labour!

localised_text.last_approved_text: New flying Gyro-machines will take to the air!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: New flying Gyro-machines will take to the air!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let me assure my traditionalist brethren within the Guild that Morgrim himself would be pleased with this innovation.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Let me assure my traditionalist brethren within the Guild that Morgrim himself would be pleased with this innovation.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now let us test them against the eternal enemy - the ones who have more entries in the Great Book of Grudges than any other - the Orcs!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now let us test them against the eternal enemy - the ones who have more entries in the Great Book of Grudges than any other - the Orcs!

localised_text.last_approved_text: See how the Greenskin filth flock around that vile pillar! Let us wipe them out!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: See how the Greenskin filth flock around that vile pillar! Let us wipe them out!

localised_text.last_approved_text: So confident am I in these new machines that I forsake my axe, and will not take it up again until victory is secured here.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So confident am I in these new machines that I forsake my axe, and will not take it up again until victory is secured here.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I do this in the knowledge that those Orcs will soon be corpses scattering the battlefield. Let us be about this!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I do this in the knowledge that those Orcs will soon be corpses scattering the battlefield. Let us be about this!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Behold! The stone-fruits of the Engineers' Guild's labour - new flying Gyro-machines will take to the air!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Behold! The stone-fruits of the Engineers' Guild's labour - new flying Gyro-machines will take to the air!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let me assure my traditionalist brethren within the Guild, that Morgrim himself would be pleased with this innovation.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Let me assure my traditionalist brethren within the Guild, that Morgrim himself would be pleased with this innovation.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now let us test them against the eternal enemy - the ones who have more entries in the Great Book of Grudges than any other - the Orcs!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now let us test them against the eternal enemy - the ones who have more entries in the Great Book of Grudges than any other - the Orcs!

localised_text.last_approved_text: See how the Greenskin filth flock around that vile pillar! Let us wipe them out, so confident am I in these new machines that I forsake my axe, and will not take it up again until victory is secured here.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: See how the Greenskin filth flock around that vile pillar! Let us wipe them out, so confident am I in these new machines that I forsake my axe, and will not take it up again until victory is secured here.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I do this in the knowledge that those Orcs will soon be corpses scattering the battlefield.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I do this in the knowledge that those Orcs will soon be corpses scattering the battlefield.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let us be about this!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Let us be about this!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We come to Hel Fenn - this fetid realm - to extract vengeance! A great wrong has befallen our kin, innocent Clans-Dwarfs on a trade mission have been butchered by the Uzkular!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We come to Hel Fenn - this fetid realm - to extract vengeance! A great wrong has befallen our kin, innocent Clans-Dwarfs on a trade mission have been butchered by the Uzkular!

localised_text.last_approved_text: This fell deed has been entered into the Dammaz Kron and the cover slammed shut in rage! By my oath it shall not be opened until the grudge is settled, until the bones of the Undead are smashed to powder!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: This fell deed has been entered into the Dammaz Kron and the cover slammed shut in rage! By my oath it shall not be opened until the grudge is settled, until the bones of the Undead are smashed to powder!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now, Dawi, take up your axes, for the Undead will come to face us. They must, or I’ll have every tomb, every cursed gravesite, scoured from these lands, leaving these fell vampires with no puppets to command…

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now, Dawi, take up your axes, for the Undead will come to face us. They must, or I’ll have every tomb, every cursed gravesite, scoured from these lands, leaving these fell vampires with no puppets to command…

localised_text.last_approved_text: Come then, Zangunaz - raise your minions, march them forth for the High King of the Karaz Ankor would have his vengeance on you all!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Come then, Zangunaz - raise your minions, march them forth for the High King of the Karaz Ankor would have his vengeance on you all!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Once more we will ally with the Manlings, just as Grimnir did ten-score centuries ago! It has been many years since the umgi have produced an Emperor as worthy as Magnus or their founding Warrior-King, but… I hear good things about this Franz.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Once more we will ally with the Manlings, just as Grimnir did ten-score centuries ago! It has been many years since the umgi have produced an Emperor as worthy as Magnus or their founding Warrior-King, but… I hear good things about this Franz.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now is the time to test his mettle, we will stand with him against the grobi at Black Fire Pass as King Kurgan did long ago.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now is the time to test his mettle, we will stand with him against the grobi at Black Fire Pass as King Kurgan did long ago.

localised_text.last_approved_text: If the men of the Empire fight with bravery and honour then the runes of my crown will glow with pride ever after, a gesture of my will - just as this Emperor awaits to take up his Warhammer – a gift from the Dwarfs no less…

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: If the men of the Empire fight with bravery and honour then the runes of my crown will glow with pride ever after, a gesture of my will - just as this Emperor awaits to take up his Warhammer – a gift from the Dwarfs no less…

localised_text.last_approved_text: So, gird your loins, my kin. May your az be sharp and thirsty for urk blood, for they come.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So, gird your loins, my kin. May your az be sharp and thirsty for urk blood, for they come.

localised_text.last_approved_text: We will repulse these vile creatures with our dying breath and renew the oldest and greatest alliance this world has ever seen!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We will repulse these vile creatures with our dying breath and renew the oldest and greatest alliance this world has ever seen!

localised_text.last_approved_text: March on, brave Dawi, march on!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: March on, brave Dawi, march on!

localised_text.last_approved_text: To the cursed realms of the grobi we go. I know not what mischief they cause, but they are up to something for my beard itches with trouble!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: To the cursed realms of the grobi we go. I know not what mischief they cause, but they are up to something for my beard itches with trouble!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We take the Underway, these ancient highways built by Dwarf hands give us the best chance of approaching swiftly - catching the Greenskins unawares…

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We take the Underway, these ancient highways built by Dwarf hands give us the best chance of approaching swiftly - catching the Greenskins unawares…

localised_text.last_approved_text: So let us not dawdle, for there are grudges to settle and new entries in the Dammaz Kron to write!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So let us not dawdle, for there are grudges to settle and new entries in the Dammaz Kron to write!

localised_text.last_approved_text: There… there, across the way… the discordance. For the Axe of Dargo to sing again, for the runes to glow bright with power once more, we must destroy the foe before us - the Chaos filth that dare cross our mountains!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: There… there, across the way… the discordance. For the Axe of Dargo to sing again, for the runes to glow bright with power once more, we must destroy the foe before us - the Chaos filth that dare cross our mountains!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We do this in the name of Grimnir. For it will be a joy to spill the blood of Northmen.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We do this in the name of Grimnir. For it will be a joy to spill the blood of Northmen.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The enemy Lord is a taint upon the world, yet in fighting him I shall make a thing of wondrous beauty. A perfect song of weaponcraft in whose rhythm the axe of my ancestor shall find harmony anew.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The enemy Lord is a taint upon the world, yet in fighting him I shall make a thing of wondrous beauty. A perfect song of weaponcraft in whose rhythm the axe of my ancestor shall find harmony anew.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slayers - I hear your howls of longing, desperate to be about this, to plunge your axes into the Chaos scum before us. So, go - bring me victory, bring me death!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Slayers - I hear your howls of longing, desperate to be about this, to plunge your axes into the Chaos scum before us. So, go - bring me victory, bring me death!

localised_text.last_approved_text: At last! Enough of this larking about, lads. It is time to arm ourselves, to act like Slayers and bring death to the urks - and especially those snivelling grobi!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: At last! Enough of this larking about, lads. It is time to arm ourselves, to act like Slayers and bring death to the urks - and especially those snivelling grobi!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I wish to cleanse myself in battle, once I have cleaned my soul of the subterfuge then I will wear the honourable Cloak of Fyrskar again!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I wish to cleanse myself in battle, once I have cleaned my soul of the subterfuge then I will wear the honourable Cloak of Fyrskar again!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now, my throng, ready your shield walls, bring the oath stones, let us dreng all before us! When the job is done I will crack open a barrel of Bugman’s and we will drink until none can stand!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now, my throng, ready your shield walls, bring the oath stones, let us dreng all before us! When the job is done I will crack open a barrel of Bugman’s and we will drink until none can stand!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Are you with me, lads?!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Are you with me, lads?!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Dawi to me - there is no time for grand speeches.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Dawi to me - there is no time for grand speeches.

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Uzkular gather before that shrine, their evil masters in the midst of some Valaya-cursed ritual!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The Uzkular gather before that shrine, their evil masters in the midst of some Valaya-cursed ritual!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I want it stopped!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I want it stopped!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Strike them down - bring me the heads of the craven things lurking in that shrine!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Strike them down - bring me the heads of the craven things lurking in that shrine!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slayers! I see before me the Zangunaz and its filthy minions.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Slayers! I see before me the Zangunaz and its filthy minions.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Even now the vampire stands there, chanting filthy umgi spells, trying to summon some abomination. It is time to fulfil your oaths made in Karak Kadrin!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Even now the vampire stands there, chanting filthy umgi spells, trying to summon some abomination. It is time to fulfil your oaths made in Karak Kadrin!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Slay everything that does not draw breath! And if some beast does get pulled back to life, then I relish meeting it in battle!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Slay everything that does not draw breath! And if some beast does get pulled back to life, then I relish meeting it in battle!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now we move! Charge for the honour of all Kadrin! Charge for your King! Charge for the Slayer Crown! CHAAAARGE!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now we move! Charge for the honour of all Kadrin! Charge for your King! Charge for the Slayer Crown! CHAAAARGE!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Curse the gods! This is the wrong location, I can already feel the absence of the Amulet.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Curse the gods! This is the wrong location, I can already feel the absence of the Amulet.

localised_text.last_approved_text: And yet we cannot retreat. The retainers of Marbad - once-ally of Sigmar and wielder of Ulfshard - stir in their tombs.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: And yet we cannot retreat. The retainers of Marbad - once-ally of Sigmar and wielder of Ulfshard - stir in their tombs.

localised_text.last_approved_text: We could leave this mess for Todbringer to clear up, after all, this is his province, but, alas, Franz would not thank me.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We could leave this mess for Todbringer to clear up, after all, this is his province, but, alas, Franz would not thank me.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Ready your weapons, followers, we need to put down these Unliving servants of Marbad once and for all!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Ready your weapons, followers, we need to put down these Unliving servants of Marbad once and for all!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Welcome to Estalia, gentlemen.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Welcome to Estalia, gentlemen.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I will not lie, the chances of your survival are small - some may even turn against your friends as living corpses… But you have my word that I will use my arcane gifts to ensure your bodies are given unto Morr’s garden.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I will not lie, the chances of your survival are small - some may even turn against your friends as living corpses… But you have my word that I will use my arcane gifts to ensure your bodies are given unto Morr’s garden.

localised_text.last_approved_text: This is the greatest reward, more than even gold for the fate of your soul is an eternal concern!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: This is the greatest reward, more than even gold for the fate of your soul is an eternal concern!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now, come. Follow me, strike down the Undead that rise against us, allow me to find this eldritch amulet. I ask not for my own selfish studies but for the good of the Empire!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now, come. Follow me, strike down the Undead that rise against us, allow me to find this eldritch amulet. I ask not for my own selfish studies but for the good of the Empire!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We search for Gromril ore. These Greenskins have it, slaughter them and find it for me!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We search for Gromril ore. These Greenskins have it, slaughter them and find it for me!

localised_text.last_approved_text: And if the Dwarfs should think we carry out vengeance for their kin - then let them. I’d rather make allies of the bearded ones than enemies, they hold grudges and I have not the time or inclination for another enemy. There are greater, more pressing fates at work!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: And if the Dwarfs should think we carry out vengeance for their kin - then let them. I’d rather make allies of the bearded ones than enemies, they hold grudges and I have not the time or inclination for another enemy. There are greater, more pressing fates at work!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now, bring me the heads of the Orcs, for I will have their skulls turned to gold, their eyes pierced with hot lead - they will truly know Searing Doom!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now, bring me the heads of the Orcs, for I will have their skulls turned to gold, their eyes pierced with hot lead - they will truly know Searing Doom!

localised_text.last_approved_text: With me, followers - we will descend into Drake-Tooth Hollow, this cave of ill-aspect, for within lies an artefact of great power.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: With me, followers - we will descend into Drake-Tooth Hollow, this cave of ill-aspect, for within lies an artefact of great power.

localised_text.last_approved_text: My arcane talents tell me this place is not unprotected, an ancient, once-dead guardian lies in wait. We must destroy it before we can collect the cave’s secrets. You will do this for me.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: My arcane talents tell me this place is not unprotected, an ancient, once-dead guardian lies in wait. We must destroy it before we can collect the cave’s secrets. You will do this for me.

localised_text.last_approved_text: This is a dread task but my rewards will be great, for I can spin gold from lead, and as the Supreme Patriarch is there is a more powerful ally you can have?!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: This is a dread task but my rewards will be great, for I can spin gold from lead, and as the Supreme Patriarch is there is a more powerful ally you can have?!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Begin your advance, banish the guardians of this place, and think of the rewards you will have once the Cloak of Molten Metal is mine!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Begin your advance, banish the guardians of this place, and think of the rewards you will have once the Cloak of Molten Metal is mine!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Men of the Empire! I am no Warrior Priest blessed with the gift of making grand speeches, I am no orator - that is true. But I am not a cold man despite this mask, frozen in its stern aspect.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Men of the Empire! I am no Warrior Priest blessed with the gift of making grand speeches, I am no orator - that is true. But I am not a cold man despite this mask, frozen in its stern aspect.

localised_text.last_approved_text: What we do this day, is not just some plot to gain favour for the mantle of Supreme Patriarch… No… There is much more at risk, if the Mountain God awakes, if Sun-Eater is roused from his ancient slumber all that we hold precious is doomed. We must stop the summoning and stop it now!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: What we do this day, is not just some plot to gain favour for the mantle of Supreme Patriarch… No… There is much more at risk, if the Mountain God awakes, if Sun-Eater is roused from his ancient slumber all that we hold precious is doomed. We must stop the summoning and stop it now!

localised_text.last_approved_text: If Orr thinks he can take what is rightfully mine then he is very much mistaken!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: If Orr thinks he can take what is rightfully mine then he is very much mistaken!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I will be Supreme Patriarch - I will wield the Staff of Volans!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I will be Supreme Patriarch - I will wield the Staff of Volans!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Wind of Chamon will rise and blast any who get in my way! Now is the time for the Gold Order and I will brook no interference, any who get in my way will see their armour run into lead goblets, their blades melt and their bones turned to gold!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The Wind of Chamon will rise and blast any who get in my way! Now is the time for the Gold Order and I will brook no interference, any who get in my way will see their armour run into lead goblets, their blades melt and their bones turned to gold!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now, men, fight - bring me victory. The Emperor needs me, not some pathetic Pyromancer or insipid white wizard!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now, men, fight - bring me victory. The Emperor needs me, not some pathetic Pyromancer or insipid white wizard!

localised_text.last_approved_text: For the good of the Empire, I will rise to the highest magical office in the land, and this fool will not stop me!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: For the good of the Empire, I will rise to the highest magical office in the land, and this fool will not stop me!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Now is the time, Men of the Empire, to unite - for the Orcs gather. Beyond the pass, a Warboss draws to him all that is foul - an Orc horde beyond imagining!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Now is the time, Men of the Empire, to unite - for the Orcs gather. Beyond the pass, a Warboss draws to him all that is foul - an Orc horde beyond imagining!

localised_text.last_approved_text: As Sigmar fought, so shall we; we will become part of the legend; We will wipe the Orcs from our door; And only when this is done - when our nation has healed - shall I take up Ghal Maraz!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: As Sigmar fought, so shall we; we will become part of the legend; We will wipe the Orcs from our door; And only when this is done - when our nation has healed - shall I take up Ghal Maraz!

localised_text.last_approved_text: For Sigmar, for the Empire, for the WARHAMMER!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: For Sigmar, for the Empire, for the WARHAMMER!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Come, men - it seems Todbringer sends his Midden wolves across the Reik to test our mettle!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Come, men - it seems Todbringer sends his Midden wolves across the Reik to test our mettle!

localised_text.last_approved_text: He seems to think that since my father’s death Reikland is weak and we cower under our beds waiting for these Ulric-worshippers to save us from our woes!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: He seems to think that since my father’s death Reikland is weak and we cower under our beds waiting for these Ulric-worshippers to save us from our woes!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I say, we Reiklanders are more than capable of defending ourselves - I say, we show Todbringer’s mongrels that Reiklander blood flows through our veins!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I say, we Reiklanders are more than capable of defending ourselves - I say, we show Todbringer’s mongrels that Reiklander blood flows through our veins!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We face the trespassers deep in the Bloodpines - keep your wits, lads, for there is more than Ulric’s dogs in there… My father had to send the Reiksguard in to purge these woods of Forest Goblin filth more than once during his reign.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We face the trespassers deep in the Bloodpines - keep your wits, lads, for there is more than Ulric’s dogs in there… My father had to send the Reiksguard in to purge these woods of Forest Goblin filth more than once during his reign.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yet, that is not what we face today. No, today we send the Elector Count of Middenland a message that it is the House of Franz that protects the borders of Reikland!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Yet, that is not what we face today. No, today we send the Elector Count of Middenland a message that it is the House of Franz that protects the borders of Reikland!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hear me now, brave men - brave Reiklanders - hear me!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Hear me now, brave men - brave Reiklanders - hear me!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Celestial Wizards read the portents true. Norse Raiders land on Nordland’s shores. We have marched many miles, but there is no distance so great that I would not gladly march it to face this - our ultimate foe!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The Celestial Wizards read the portents true. Norse Raiders land on Nordland’s shores. We have marched many miles, but there is no distance so great that I would not gladly march it to face this - our ultimate foe!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I have refused the honour of wielding the blade of our forebears thus far. I was not worthy. But should we survive this day, should we drive the ruinous tribes back across the sea - then, with your blessing - I will pick up the Reikland Runefang and use it to bleed our foes - to carve my way through Sigmar's enemies!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I have refused the honour of wielding the blade of our forebears thus far. I was not worthy. But should we survive this day, should we drive the ruinous tribes back across the sea - then, with your blessing - I will pick up the Reikland Runefang and use it to bleed our foes - to carve my way through Sigmar's enemies!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Are you with me, Men of the Empire? For when the Northmen come, they will attack hard as their despicable gods demand. We must be ready to push them back, thrust them into the sea in defence of the Empire!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Are you with me, Men of the Empire? For when the Northmen come, they will attack hard as their despicable gods demand. We must be ready to push them back, thrust them into the sea in defence of the Empire!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hear me now, brave men - brave Reiklanders - hear me!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Hear me now, brave men - brave Reiklanders - hear me!
