localised_text.last_approved_text: Are you with me, Men of the Empire? For when the Northmen come, they will attack hard as their despicable Gods demand. We must be ready to push them back, thrust them into the sea in defence of the Empire!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Are you with me, Men of the Empire? For when the Northmen come, they will attack hard as their despicable Gods demand. We must be ready to push them back, thrust them into the sea in defence of the Empire!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We hunt this day! Yet, our quarry is neither boar nor deer, no, we pursue the Undead!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We hunt this day! Yet, our quarry is neither boar nor deer, no, we pursue the Undead!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The Witch Hunters bring word that a Vampire crone makes haste for Stirland with the Silver Seal in her clutches! I charge you brave men with not letting that Vampiress get to Sylvania!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The Witch Hunters bring word that a Vampire crone makes haste for Stirland with the Silver Seal in her clutches! I charge you brave men with not letting that Vampiress get to Sylvania!

localised_text.last_approved_text: For we know she is a puppet, her strings pulled by that cursed wretch, von Carstein! Now, men, chase her down. Return to me what is mine and send these von Carstein beasts a message… by taking her head!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: For we know she is a puppet, her strings pulled by that cursed wretch, von Carstein! Now, men, chase her down. Return to me what is mine and send these von Carstein beasts a message… by taking her head!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We have brought her to bay at the centre of a forsaken temple, syphoning off ill magicks to power her dread spells, have no doubt! Surround the crone - slay the creature before she can summon her minions.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We have brought her to bay at the centre of a forsaken temple, syphoning off ill magicks to power her dread spells, have no doubt! Surround the crone - slay the creature before she can summon her minions.

localised_text.last_approved_text: By order of the Grand Theogonist - show no mercy!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: By order of the Grand Theogonist - show no mercy!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Dose Stoopid flouncy humies fink they can trounce all over our sacred ground. Dat burial mound iz Mork's property not some fishy-smellin lake-hag's...

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Dose Stoopid flouncy humies fink they can trounce all over our sacred ground. Dat burial mound iz Mork's property not some fishy-smellin lake-hag's...

localised_text.last_approved_text: Bloomin 'at, stop whisperin' at me, I know!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Bloomin 'at, stop whisperin' at me, I know!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Come on ladz, we're gonna stamp these gits and send them runnin' back to their pretty towers. I've 'ad my vision from Mork 'imself. He reckons if we doo this, it's gonna sort my armour out real good and I won't 'ave to knock you all about.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Come on ladz, we're gonna stamp these gits and send them runnin' back to their pretty towers. I've 'ad my vision from Mork 'imself. He reckons if we doo this, it's gonna sort my armour out real good and I won't 'ave to knock you all about.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Wassat? Yez, we'll go south afterwards.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Wassat? Yez, we'll go south afterwards.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let'z go an' kill some Knights!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Let'z go an' kill some Knights!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Alright, ladz. ‘Ere's da plan!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Alright, ladz. ‘Ere's da plan!

localised_text.last_approved_text: We goin' into dis lost city. But before we can rummage, we got to clear out all dem Undead things. Give ‘em a good kickin'!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We goin' into dis lost city. But before we can rummage, we got to clear out all dem Undead things. Give ‘em a good kickin'!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Once we killed everyfing, no one’z ta go lootin’ until I say so. Dis is my plan so I get da top picks. I’m in charge now, an' I need a shiny Boss-‘at! Anyone ‘oo disobeyz will get a boot up dere backside!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Once we killed everyfing, no one’z ta go lootin’ until I say so. Dis is my plan so I get da top picks. I’m in charge now, an' I need a shiny Boss-‘at! Anyone ‘oo disobeyz will get a boot up dere backside!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Remember, dis is a cursed place, da Shamans don't like it, so no messin' wiv stuff ya don't understand. If ya summon something from da void - yoo ‘ll ‘ave ta deal with it yerself!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Remember, dis is a cursed place, da Shamans don't like it, so no messin' wiv stuff ya don't understand. If ya summon something from da void - yoo ‘ll ‘ave ta deal with it yerself!

localised_text.last_approved_text: At last! A chance to try a full out-flanking manoeuvre! A grand strategy wasted on the fleeing humans and these brainless Greenskin creatures...

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: At last! A chance to try a full out-flanking manoeuvre! A grand strategy wasted on the fleeing humans and these brainless Greenskin creatures...

localised_text.last_approved_text: Shut it, Iron ‘at, I don't need your poncey tactics!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Shut it, Iron ‘at, I don't need your poncey tactics!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Listen up, Boyz - they started callin' me "da Slaughterer". I like dat name, let'z not disappoint ‘em!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Listen up, Boyz - they started callin' me "da Slaughterer". I like dat name, let'z not disappoint ‘em!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I sed, shuddup! We'll go south later. I got some bizniss ‘ere first!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I sed, shuddup! We'll go south later. I got some bizniss ‘ere first!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Dese savages are gettin' in my way! They're led by som git called "Slagga". I want ‘iz ‘ead.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Dese savages are gettin' in my way! They're led by som git called "Slagga". I want ‘iz ‘ead.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Shaddup, crown! Dis is not a waste of time! We kill ‘oo I say we kill!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Shaddup, crown! Dis is not a waste of time! We kill ‘oo I say we kill!

localised_text.last_approved_text: The plan's simple... I want a full pincer movement - attacking from the east and west flanks at the same time, will increase our chances of success…

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The plan's simple... I want a full pincer movement - attacking from the east and west flanks at the same time, will increase our chances of success…

localised_text.last_approved_text: ...Wot? Eh? Sodding dead bloke taking over my words again!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: ...Wot? Eh? Sodding dead bloke taking over my words again!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Get yer choppas out, ladz, it's time to move... And if ya want ta doo that flanking manoeuvre-wotsit, we probably should, cos I've got a feelin' it might work.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Get yer choppas out, ladz, it's time to move... And if ya want ta doo that flanking manoeuvre-wotsit, we probably should, cos I've got a feelin' it might work.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Hahaha! Very cleva! I like it! Surround us on yer nags… Immortulz ta me. I’m gonna kill dis Chaos Lord; smash iz ‘elmet off and pulp iz ‘ead with it - we’re gonna ‘ave right laff!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Hahaha! Very cleva! I like it! Surround us on yer nags… Immortulz ta me. I’m gonna kill dis Chaos Lord; smash iz ‘elmet off and pulp iz ‘ead with it - we’re gonna ‘ave right laff!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I ain’t talkin’ for talkin’s sake. My time’s better spent killin’ stunties.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I ain’t talkin’ for talkin’s sake. My time’s better spent killin’ stunties.

localised_text.last_approved_text: If yoo want ta come and kill som stunties too - then come. But don’t be getting’ in my or da immortulz way. I don’t care ‘oo’s under my choppa, and if it’s your skull instead of a stoopid stunty, I’ll laff just as ‘ard!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: If yoo want ta come and kill som stunties too - then come. But don’t be getting’ in my or da immortulz way. I don’t care ‘oo’s under my choppa, and if it’s your skull instead of a stoopid stunty, I’ll laff just as ‘ard!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Come on then, let's go and scalp stunty beards! Grrrraaaasagh!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Come on then, let's go and scalp stunty beards! Grrrraaaasagh!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Those Chaos men, ‘ave got some shiny stuff. Fink they can keep it from us?!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Those Chaos men, ‘ave got some shiny stuff. Fink they can keep it from us?!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Dese Chaos-gitz are meant to be ‘ard… dey got squiffy Godz that will turn ‘em into gribbly monsterz if dey’re not!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Dese Chaos-gitz are meant to be ‘ard… dey got squiffy Godz that will turn ‘em into gribbly monsterz if dey’re not!

localised_text.last_approved_text: So we’re gonna ‘ave a good scrap, da northern humies better not disappoint!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So we’re gonna ‘ave a good scrap, da northern humies better not disappoint!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Wot’s more - they’re haulin’ a load of shiny stuff back from the big-hatted Stunties. They fink they can keep it from uz, I wantz it all! Go get ‘em, ladz!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Wot’s more - they’re haulin’ a load of shiny stuff back from the big-hatted Stunties. They fink they can keep it from uz, I wantz it all! Go get ‘em, ladz!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Raaaaargh! Dis iz it, Boyz! Time to give dis ‘Empera’ a right spankin’!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Raaaaargh! Dis iz it, Boyz! Time to give dis ‘Empera’ a right spankin’!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Me and da Immortulz will lead from da front and seek out da poncey crown-wearin’ git ridin' 'iz big pigeon!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Me and da Immortulz will lead from da front and seek out da poncey crown-wearin’ git ridin' 'iz big pigeon!

localised_text.last_approved_text: My axe, Gitsnik, is somewhere in dat pass. A bag of teef to the Orc dat finds it and 'ands it over.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: My axe, Gitsnik, is somewhere in dat pass. A bag of teef to the Orc dat finds it and 'ands it over.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Any 'oo fink they're gonna keep it instead, well... you'll find my boot so far up yer arse, you'll be tasting squig-leather until yoo die - which will be straight after!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Any 'oo fink they're gonna keep it instead, well... you'll find my boot so far up yer arse, you'll be tasting squig-leather until yoo die - which will be straight after!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Anyway! Let’s give Gork a show - get smashin! I want dis pass filled with blood!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Anyway! Let’s give Gork a show - get smashin! I want dis pass filled with blood!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I want da Humies to remember my name for yearz and yearz… remember GRIMGOR!!!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I want da Humies to remember my name for yearz and yearz… remember GRIMGOR!!!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Raaaaargh! Dis iz it, Boyz! Time to give dis ‘Empera’ a right spankin’! Me and da Immortulz will lead from da front and seek out da poncey crown-wearin’ git ridin' on 'iz big pigeon!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Raaaaargh! Dis iz it, Boyz! Time to give dis ‘Empera’ a right spankin’! Me and da Immortulz will lead from da front and seek out da poncey crown-wearin’ git ridin' on 'iz big pigeon!

localised_text.last_approved_text: My axe, Gitsnik, is somewhere in dat pass. A bag of teef to the Orc dat finds it and 'ands it over.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: My axe, Gitsnik, is somewhere in dat pass. A bag of teef to the Orc dat finds it and 'ands it over.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Any 'oo fink they're gonna keep it instead, well... you'll find my boot so far up yer arse, you'll be tasting squig-leather until yoo die - which will be straight after!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Any 'oo fink they're gonna keep it instead, well... you'll find my boot so far up yer arse, you'll be tasting squig-leather until yoo die - which will be straight after!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Anyway! Let’s give Gork a show. - get smashin! I want dis pass filled with blood, I want da Humies to remember my name for yearz and yearz… remember GRIMGOR!!!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Anyway! Let’s give Gork a show. - get smashin! I want dis pass filled with blood, I want da Humies to remember my name for yearz and yearz… remember GRIMGOR!!!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Da Stunties come to stop us?! Hahahaha!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Da Stunties come to stop us?! Hahahaha!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Time for a ruck, I say! I'm gonna enjoy pulling dese beards from dere chins.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Time for a ruck, I say! I'm gonna enjoy pulling dese beards from dere chins.

localised_text.last_approved_text: First, though, we need to break dem big gunz - dats just cheatin’! I want som boyz on dat straight away. Stop their artillery from shootin’ and we get more time scrappin’, just as Mork like’s it!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: First, though, we need to break dem big gunz - dats just cheatin’! I want som boyz on dat straight away. Stop their artillery from shootin’ and we get more time scrappin’, just as Mork like’s it!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Watch it though, just cos dere short doesn’t mean one or two of ‘em aint ‘andy with their own choppas. Dey like fighting underground… but so do we! Ask any rat-man under Mount Red Eye!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Watch it though, just cos dere short doesn’t mean one or two of ‘em aint ‘andy with their own choppas. Dey like fighting underground… but so do we! Ask any rat-man under Mount Red Eye!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Right, Boyz, dats da plan. Immortulz, get yer choppas out, dis one's gonna be fun!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Right, Boyz, dats da plan. Immortulz, get yer choppas out, dis one's gonna be fun!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I see… I see…

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I see… I see…

localised_text.last_approved_text: These servants of the Ruinous Powers search for something… or someone. Oh, how delightful - could Krell be down there? If I could right what Grimbul Ironhelm did wrong and return Krell to Unlife, well, that would be a feat wouldn’t it?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: These servants of the Ruinous Powers search for something… or someone. Oh, how delightful - could Krell be down there? If I could right what Grimbul Ironhelm did wrong and return Krell to Unlife, well, that would be a feat wouldn’t it?

localised_text.last_approved_text: And what other treasures are buried with the champion? What wondrous antiquities have been lost to the world?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: And what other treasures are buried with the champion? What wondrous antiquities have been lost to the world?

localised_text.last_approved_text: A blade of great power, I’ll warrant! Should I let these blind fools have the spoils? I think not, I think they should make way for the Lichemaster, and if such an act angers their Dark Gods? Well, there are pacts to be made, secrets to share, and covenants to be sworn, I’m sure.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: A blade of great power, I’ll warrant! Should I let these blind fools have the spoils? I think not, I think they should make way for the Lichemaster, and if such an act angers their Dark Gods? Well, there are pacts to be made, secrets to share, and covenants to be sworn, I’m sure.

localised_text.last_approved_text: A decision has been made then, oh yes, slay the Chaos dogs - oust them for Kemmler, my pretties!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: A decision has been made then, oh yes, slay the Chaos dogs - oust them for Kemmler, my pretties!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Oh dear me, oh no, we can’t have this, can we?

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Oh dear me, oh no, we can’t have this, can we?

localised_text.last_approved_text: The treasures in that tomb - the spirit-essence that was once Marbad of the Endals - is mine to harvest, not for these impudent Goblins to worship.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: The treasures in that tomb - the spirit-essence that was once Marbad of the Endals - is mine to harvest, not for these impudent Goblins to worship.

localised_text.last_approved_text: What a to do - we shall have to sort this mess out! Punish these creatures, oh yes, make them think twice about trespassing on the barrows of the dead!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: What a to do - we shall have to sort this mess out! Punish these creatures, oh yes, make them think twice about trespassing on the barrows of the dead!

localised_text.last_approved_text: That’s right - slay the Goblins, my wondrous Wights, my warriors of bone, my monsters of necrotic flesh - do my bidding, release them of life!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: That’s right - slay the Goblins, my wondrous Wights, my warriors of bone, my monsters of necrotic flesh - do my bidding, release them of life!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Then the mist and shadows will form around me - a cloak formed of the stuff of night!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Then the mist and shadows will form around me - a cloak formed of the stuff of night!

localised_text.last_approved_text: How glorious!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: How glorious!

localised_text.last_approved_text: It has been such fun watching the Empire and Bretonnians rip each other apart. Supplying me with fresh stock as they do - oh, the irony!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: It has been such fun watching the Empire and Bretonnians rip each other apart. Supplying me with fresh stock as they do - oh, the irony!

localised_text.last_approved_text: But while pulling their strings, working them like puppets has been immensely satisfying - it is now time for direct intervention.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: But while pulling their strings, working them like puppets has been immensely satisfying - it is now time for direct intervention.

localised_text.last_approved_text: This abbey, this altar of Taal is my desire, the Skull Staff within calls to me and I would have it.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: This abbey, this altar of Taal is my desire, the Skull Staff within calls to me and I would have it.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Let the chittering hordes come and claim their warpstone if they must, for me, the true prize is that wand of Dark Magic. With it, the legend of the Lichemaster will only grow!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Let the chittering hordes come and claim their warpstone if they must, for me, the true prize is that wand of Dark Magic. With it, the legend of the Lichemaster will only grow!

localised_text.last_approved_text: My legions advance! Bring me bone, bring me flesh, but do not bring me these things back alive!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: My legions advance! Bring me bone, bring me flesh, but do not bring me these things back alive!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Vermin! Greenskinned filth with base blood pumping through their crude veins! They serve no purpose, they are poor minions, even in death!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Vermin! Greenskinned filth with base blood pumping through their crude veins! They serve no purpose, they are poor minions, even in death!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I would have this land for mine studies. And yet I am pestered by these filthy creatures.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I would have this land for mine studies. And yet I am pestered by these filthy creatures.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I shall play the role of exterminator - wipe these Orcs out.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I shall play the role of exterminator - wipe these Orcs out.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I have always despised Bretonnia - a land ruled by some pitiful witch the smallfolk dare to call a god.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I have always despised Bretonnia - a land ruled by some pitiful witch the smallfolk dare to call a god.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Only I can bring the night - the flower of Bretonnia shall wither and the tomb that holds mine prize be broken open and those inside shall serve me!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Only I can bring the night - the flower of Bretonnia shall wither and the tomb that holds mine prize be broken open and those inside shall serve me!

localised_text.last_approved_text: They shall know a true deity! I am a god, let thy grave-bound and thy living worship me - Mannfred the wise; Mannfred the Unliving, Mannfred the Merciless!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: They shall know a true deity! I am a god, let thy grave-bound and thy living worship me - Mannfred the wise; Mannfred the Unliving, Mannfred the Merciless!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Arise Grave-bound! I command thee to attend!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Arise Grave-bound! I command thee to attend!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Franz - the son of whores and tumorous Burgomeisters - thinks the crown is his! But the house of the Reikland Electors is tainted. As the last great count of Stirland, mine claim is the truest, I should be Emperor - I *will* be Emperor!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Franz - the son of whores and tumorous Burgomeisters - thinks the crown is his! But the house of the Reikland Electors is tainted. As the last great count of Stirland, mine claim is the truest, I should be Emperor - I *will* be Emperor!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Bring thy swords…Go, mine minions, reap death - dance a Danse Macabre!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Bring thy swords…Go, mine minions, reap death - dance a Danse Macabre!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Look how the insects gather around the Arcane Fulcrum, chanting their pathetic rituals.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Look how the insects gather around the Arcane Fulcrum, chanting their pathetic rituals.

localised_text.last_approved_text: We shall slaughter them in its shadow, ensorcelling the Pillar of Bone with necromantic energy, and then mine blade will be bathed in unholy power!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: We shall slaughter them in its shadow, ensorcelling the Pillar of Bone with necromantic energy, and then mine blade will be bathed in unholy power!

localised_text.last_approved_text: It is time! The Dead March!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: It is time! The Dead March!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Wazzock! You slime-worshippin' umgi filth-merchant! Get your arse and that pet reptile over here!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Wazzock! You slime-worshippin' umgi filth-merchant! Get your arse and that pet reptile over here!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I would have words with your little beast face-to-face, so that I may lop off its claw and reclaim what is mine.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I would have words with your little beast face-to-face, so that I may lop off its claw and reclaim what is mine.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Those scales are from my armour and no thief steals from the White Dwarf and lives.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Those scales are from my armour and no thief steals from the White Dwarf and lives.

localised_text.last_approved_text: You and your followers will die - that is my oath, as my kin, Grimnir, is witness!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: You and your followers will die - that is my oath, as my kin, Grimnir, is witness!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Right, my northern kin, let's get about this.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Right, my northern kin, let's get about this.

localised_text.last_approved_text: These Chaos-lovin' umgi are in need of a reckoning, alright.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: These Chaos-lovin' umgi are in need of a reckoning, alright.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I have an oath to fulfil, so don't mind me if I'm greedy, but I need to kill lots of kruti braggarts to get my axe channelin' me runes.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I have an oath to fulfil, so don't mind me if I'm greedy, but I need to kill lots of kruti braggarts to get my axe channelin' me runes.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I promised Grimnir they'd be a mighty tally and I ain't one for breaking such an oath. So come on! Let's have 'em!!!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I promised Grimnir they'd be a mighty tally and I ain't one for breaking such an oath. So come on! Let's have 'em!!!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Our Goddess has spoken to me! She who prepares the hearth; who secures our Holds.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Our Goddess has spoken to me! She who prepares the hearth; who secures our Holds.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Uzkular have been caught sneaking about like rat-men filth, trying to gain access to our mountains unseen.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Uzkular have been caught sneaking about like rat-men filth, trying to gain access to our mountains unseen.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Well, I see you, scum, and by Valaya's cloak I'll have every last rotten one of you back in that ground, pushing up your tombstones!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Well, I see you, scum, and by Valaya's cloak I'll have every last rotten one of you back in that ground, pushing up your tombstones!

localised_text.last_approved_text: At last, we have lured the Orcs to the place we Dawi fight best - in Grungni's realm!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: At last, we have lured the Orcs to the place we Dawi fight best - in Grungni's realm!

localised_text.last_approved_text: I see beside me brave Dwarfen hearts. Such courage will imbue my Rune Helm. This is a day to strike many grudges from the great book,

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I see beside me brave Dwarfen hearts. Such courage will imbue my Rune Helm. This is a day to strike many grudges from the great book,

localised_text.last_approved_text: for I am the White Dwarf and only worthy folk appear in my pages...

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: for I am the White Dwarf and only worthy folk appear in my pages...

localised_text.last_approved_text: So, let us record great deeds this day, and give these urki scum a right royal hammerin'!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: So, let us record great deeds this day, and give these urki scum a right royal hammerin'!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Oh, these poor, fragile mortals… how they arrange themselves before me; proud and defiant.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Oh, these poor, fragile mortals… how they arrange themselves before me; proud and defiant.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Soon I shall make them prostrate and subservient. In death, they will become servants to the von Carsteins, pliable and deliciously loyal.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Soon I shall make them prostrate and subservient. In death, they will become servants to the von Carsteins, pliable and deliciously loyal.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Beyond this rabble is the tomb of a soul so great and so powerful that when it flows into this ancient chalice, the power bestowed upon me will make the world tremble!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Beyond this rabble is the tomb of a soul so great and so powerful that when it flows into this ancient chalice, the power bestowed upon me will make the world tremble!

localised_text.last_approved_text: Bring me what I am owed!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Bring me what I am owed!

localised_text.last_approved_text: There is such wonder in the raw, unbridled fury of these Beastmen; they teem and fester with might.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: There is such wonder in the raw, unbridled fury of these Beastmen; they teem and fester with might.

localised_text.last_approved_text: I might find them beautiful if they weren't so terribly disgusting.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: I might find them beautiful if they weren't so terribly disgusting.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Yet they have attracted the attention of the ignorant Empire. Clearly they possess some power beyond that of their brutish ilk.

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Yet they have attracted the attention of the ignorant Empire. Clearly they possess some power beyond that of their brutish ilk.

localised_text.last_approved_text: Whatever this power is, I shall have it, and I shall use it to ascend the von Carsteins to ever-greater magnificence!

scripted_subtitles.localised_text: Whatever this power is, I shall have it, and I shall use it to ascend the von Carsteins to ever-greater magnificence!
